name: Tactics
short_description:
Tactics is developed using Flash (Actionscript 2.0) as a front-end GUI (client) interface to a PHP and MySQL combo back-end (server). The client, map creator, and MySQL database structure are open-source and publicly available for download.

If you with to use the tactics or map creator source for non-commercial ends, please include a publicly visible link to the gt-tactics sourceforge download page somewhere in the project.

If you with to use the tactics or map creator source for commercial ends, please include a publicly visible link to the gt-tactics sourceforge download page on the "login" frame, or any place that will be seen by every user for at least five seconds.
summary: Tactics is an Online Role Playing Game developed by the Gametack team
